plot: Shegavicha Rana Gajanan is a Marathi released in 2004. Produced & directed by Babanrao Gholap. The movie is a devotional biopic, extolling the virtues and miraculous powers of the famous Maharashtrian saint.
title: Shegavicha Rana Gajanan
plot_es: Shegavicha Rana Gajanan is a Marathi released in 2004. Produced & directed by Babanrao Gholap. The movie is a devotional biopic, extolling the virtues and miraculous powers of the famous Maharashtrian saint.
